text: @realDonaldTrump @JudgeJeanine @foxandfriends Geez, you are getting more dopey the closer we get to the election. You must realize you are losing traction, even with your base, when you say loopy stuff like this. Address the growing death count from the Coronavirus instead; your supposed to be a president!
